body: Oh and I give this 9/10 always nice to see wholesome Graf Spee

@David01 In the game/anime Azur Lane she is a ship girl, essentially a warship in a humanoid form. I'm pretty certain that their personalities are based off of how their respective ship is imagined as in terms of combat abilities and how they were used and represented, so their minds are real but their bodies are non biological(Idk I've only played up to 6-3 of the game and haven't seen the anime) because in the game they are made by cubes and(The priority ships are like this so I assume the other ships are) people's imaginations. So in short a ship girl is a Sentient ship in human form with a matter body and thus shouldn't be able to get pregnant.
